Package org.cloudsimplus.autoscaling

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HorizontalVmScaling
    A Vm Horizontal Scaling mechanism used by a DatacenterBroker to dynamically create or destroy VMs according to the arrival or termination of Cloudlets, in order to enable load balancing.
    VmScaling
    An interface to allow implementing horizontal and vertical scaling of VMs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HorizontalVmScalingSimple
    A HorizontalVmScaling implementation that allows defining that the VMs from a given DatacenterBroker are overloaded or not based on the overall resource utilization of all such VMs.
